name: Rave Names
description: $RAVE is the DAO token for the Rave Names DAO. Rave Names is the first domain name service on Fantom, and have been the leading service on Fantom for over one year at the time of writing. $RAVE is our way of giving our community a voice in what happens to the protocol, and the DAO. $RAVE can also be staked and locked in both proprietary and partner protocols.
